Articles.Content:
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/Pwen4)

Mk1 of the marvelous Steam-Powered Traction Rover, called Locomotive Traction Engine for Space, or LTEfS "El-Tefs."

It's pretty massive, but such is the problems have having to use a solar boiler to generate power. And I wouldn't recommend crashing it.

> 
> L-TEfS is a small rover designed for roving around on the surface of planets or moons. It is a steam-powered traction engine, as horses generally don't like not being able to breathe.

[*Electro-Magnetic Transfer Mechanism for Transference of Craft Information Data.*](https://www.dropbox.com/s/9we73rhnbkwmo9t/Locomotive%20Traction%20Engine%20for%20Space.craft?dl=0)

(download)

Coming soon: Victorian Tech Shuttle

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-28T12:43:23Z" title="03/28/2015 12:43  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 28, 2015</time> by GregroxMun**

Hi, 

 I'm confused as to what this is. does it have any special features?

Awsomeness is the special feature.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-30T01:27:26Z" title="03/30/2015 01:27  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 30, 2015</time> by LABHOUSE**

> 
> Hi, 
>  I'm confused as to what this is. does it have any special features?

Nope. It's just a rover that looks kinda steampunk.

> 
> Nope. It's just a rover that looks kinda steampunk.

Oh, ok. Cool. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Vertical Propulsion Emporium has a set of steampunk parts including a steam-powered train.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74625-0-25-Vertical-Propulsion-Emporium-v0-20a-%2827th-Oct-2014%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74625-0-25-Vertical-Propulsion-Emporium-v0-20a-%2827th-Oct-2014%29)

> 
> Vertical Propulsion Emporium has a set of steampunk parts including a steam-powered train.
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74625-0-25-Vertical-Propulsion-Emporium-v0-20a-%2827th-Oct-2014%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/74625-0-25-Vertical-Propulsion-Emporium-v0-20a-%2827th-Oct-2014%29)

Yes I know, but this is a stock craft. (Plus VPE's textures are a bit sloppy and the whole thing just doesn't hold up to stock)
